Concern: INCORRECT BODY WIDTH COULD RESTRIC REAR VISABIITY
Defect: An an incorrect maximum permissible vehicle width was incorrectly defined on the Certificate of Conformity (COC) documentation. Due to this a customer installing a body conversion according to that defined on the COC may inadvertently fit a body width that could restrict the rear visibility.
Remedy: On affected vehciles measure the width of vehicle and where necessary fit extended mirrors
